db:abstract.db:para: Signs the .aab package with the specified keystore, alias, and store password.

db:article.db:para: Signs the .aab package with the specified keystore, alias, and store password.
This variable was introduced in Qt 6.4.

db:note.db:para: This variable is in technology preview and may change in future releases.
This variable is used only if targeting the Android platform.

db:article.db:para: Signs the resulting package. The path of the keystore file, the alias of the key, and passwords have to be specified by additional environment variables:
The mentioned variables are used internally by androiddeployqt.
